character.noteList: Dragonborn Features: • Green Dragon • You can breathe a 15 ft cone of Poison(once between rests), dealing 2d6 Poison damage, Con save for half damage (DC 11). DC = 8 + Con mod + prof • You resist Poison damage Criminal Feature: • You know someone who can connect you with other criminals Class Features: • Understand a secret druid language • You can shapeshift into the form of a beast as an action (see rules) • Druid Archetype: Moon • You can wild shape as a bonus action, and can use up a spell slot to regain 1d8 hp per spell slot level as a bonus action while wild shaped • You can wild shape into beasts of CR equal to your druid level/3 (min 1) • Grappler: You can restrain a grappled foe as an action, you gain advantage on attacks vs foe you grapple, and you can grapple creatures one size larger ⊠Light Armor, Medium Armor, Shields ⊠Clubs, Daggers, Darts, Javelins, Maces, Quarterstaffs, Scimitars, Sickles, Slings, Spears ⊠Herbalism Kit One type of gaming set Thieves' Tools ⊠Common Draconic Druidic ⊠wooden shield OR simple weapon scimitar OR simple melee weapon leather armor explorer's pack druidic focus crowbar set of dark common clothes hood belt pouch ⊠⊠Druid 5⊠Dragonborn⊠Criminal⊠⊠⊠⊠⊠⊠Rar⊠Druid 5⊠0⊠0⊠0⊠15⊠0⊠0
